text: Khanditavagiyu allahana drstiyalli islam (saranagati) naija dharmavagide. I hinde grantha nidaladavaru, tam'ma balige jnanavu banda balika kevala paraspara dvesada karana bhinnamata taliddaru. Allahana vacanagalannu dhikkarisuvavaru (tilidirali), allahanu bahala vegavagi vicarane mugisuvavanagiddane
